price: Ёки улар ердан тирилтира оладиган худоларни топиб олдиларми?!
arabic: أَمِ ٱتَّخَذُوٓاْ ءَالِهَةٗ مِّنَ ٱلۡأَرۡضِ هُمۡ يُنشِرُونَ

version.title: Uzbek Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Uzbek by Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: ami ittakhadhū ālihatan mina al-arḍi hum yunshirūna
